channel.title: CVE Feed for Paradox Security Systems (Bahamas) Ltd. -- IP150 Internet Module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Paradox Security Systems (Bahamas) Ltd. -- IP150 Internet Module

item.title: CVE-2024-5676|2024-08-01T21:18:06.885Z -- paradox%20security%20systems%20%28bahamas%29%20ltd. -- ip150%20internet%20module
item.description: The Paradox IP150 Internet Module in version 1.40.00 is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks due to a lack of countermeasures and the use of the HTTP method `GET` to introduce changes in the system.
